meanings.definition: The act or process of modernizing something.
meanings.sent1: The modernisations of the old building brought new life to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The company's modernisations to their technology improved efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The modernisations of the school's cafeteria made the students excited for lunchtime.
meanings.sent4: Her modernisations to the traditional recipe added a fresh twist to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The modernisations in the city's infrastructure made commuting much easier.

meanings.definition: The result of making something modern.
meanings.sent1: The modernisations of the house gave it a sleek and contemporary look.
meanings.sent2: The modernisations in fashion reflect the current trends.
meanings.sent3: The modernisations of the garden made it a popular spot for gatherings.
meanings.sent4: His modernisations to the car's design made it stand out on the road.
meanings.sent5: The modernisations in technology have revolutionized communication.
